00040 
00048 class Provider : public ObservableObject
00049 {
00050     public:
00052         enum Status {
00054             undefined,
00056             updated,
00058             updating,
00060             changed
00061         };
00062 
00064         enum ModificationType {
00066             Append,
00068             Insert,
00070             Commit,
00072             Delete,
00074             DeleteAll,
00076             Toggle,
00078             UndefinedModification
00079         };
00080 
00081         class Modification {
00082             public:
00083                 Modification(ModificationType type = UndefinedModification, INT row = c_no_row) 
00084                     : m_type(type), m_row(row), m_original_row_set(FALSE), m_original_row(c_no_row) {}
00085 
00086                 Modification(ModificationType type, INT row, INT original_row) 
00087                     : m_type(type), m_row(row), m_original_row_set(TRUE), m_original_row(original_row) {}
00088 
00089                 void SetType(ModificationType type) { m_type = type; }
00090 
00091                 void SetRow(INT row) { m_row = row; }
00092 
00093                 void SetOriginalRow(INT original_row) { m_original_row_set = TRUE; m_original_row = original_row; }
00094 
00095                 ModificationType GetType() const { return m_type; }
00096 
00097                 INT GetRow() const { return m_row; }
00098 
00099                 INT GetOriginalRow() const { return m_original_row_set ? m_original_row : m_row; }
00100 
00101         private:
00102                 ModificationType m_type;
00103                 INT m_row;
00104                 BOOLEAN m_original_row_set;
00105                 INT m_original_row;
00106         };
00107

00110         Provider();
00111         
00113         virtual ~Provider();

00117

00120

00123
